content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the price of the apartment. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the excellent location and the modern features of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 550 Euros per month. However, I am open to further discussions if there's room for negotiation.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but I think we can do better. I'm looking for a price that truly reflects the value of this amazing apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your perspective, I would lower the suggested rent to 520 Euros per month but would like to emphasize the benefits of this property's prime location and condition. If this price still does not meet your expectations, I'm sorry but we might have a difficult time finding a common ground.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I hear you, and I appreciate your understanding of the value of this property. However, I believe the apartment is worth even more. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In an effort to come to an agreement, I'm reducing the rental price further to 495 Euros per month. While I do believe this price is fair given the apartment's attributes, I hope it meets your needs as well. If not, I apologize but we seem to have a significant difference in opinion on the appropriate rental amount.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your point of view, but I am confident that the apartment is worth even more. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: At this point, I'm finding it challenging to lower the rental price beyond what I already have. The apartment's remarkable location and condition are already reflected in a competitive price. If my suggested 495 Euros per month does not match your expectation, I'm afraid we may have to consider ending our negotiation.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, and while it's unfortunate that we couldn't agree on a price, I respect your decision. Let's terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
